cpsc3720.contactserver

Class Sector

  • java.lang.Object
    • cpsc3720.contactserver.Sector

  • public class Sector
extends java.lang.Object
    Sector represents the set of Cells in a single sector of the universe model.
    Author:
    Matthew Higgins, Ella Kokinda, Chris levesque, Keven "Beans" Hayes
